header.title: Advanced BBCode Box 3 (aka ABBC3) - Add-on : Open YouTube videos with Lightboxes
header.description: This file provides instructions to allow YouTube videos to open in the Highslide JS, Lightview or Shadowbox effect. This will only work for YouTube videos posted using ABBC3's BBVideo bbcode, and is compatible with the standard YouTube url and the shortened youtu.be url.
header.author-notes:
REQUIREMENTS - You must have Highslide JS, Lightview or Shadowbox as your chosen Image Resizer in ABBC3's settings page in the ACP.
NOTICE: For compatability with Shadowbox, you must also check the "Flash (swf files)" box when downloading the shadowbox.js script from http://www.shadowbox-js.com/download.html.
COMMENTS: At this time only YouTube is supported. While some of these scripts may support Flash, Vimeo and other sites, we chose to only support YouTube for now. This is mainly because of thumbnails. YouTube has the easiest way for this MOD to present a clickable thumbnail of the movie.
